sqlMap.sql: SELECT A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_HIT ,A.ISSUE_STATUS ,B.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE ,E.PW_CODE ,E.PW_FUNCTION FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PW E WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE

SELECT A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_HIT ,A.ISSUE_STATUS ,B.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE ,E.PW_CODE ,E.PW_FUNCTION FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PW E WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND A.ISSUE_STATUS = 'y'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
ORDER BY ISSUE_CODE) A ) B
WHERE B.RNUM <= #startCount# AND B.RNUM >= #endCount#
ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT A.ISSUE_CODE ,TO_CHAR(issue_event_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_event_day ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_LEVEL ,A.ISLEV_CODE ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM FROM ISSUE A, EMP C WHERE A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_NAME = #issue_name# ,ISSUE_EVENT_DAY = #issue_event_day# ,ISSUE_CONTENT = #issue_content# ,ISSUE_LEVEL = #issue_level# WHERE ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_DELETE = 'y' WHERE ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(ISSUE_CODE) FROM ISSUE WHERE ISSUE_DELETE = 'n'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_HIT = ISSUE_HIT + 1 WHERE ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
